standardize the subscription api we could standardize the mechanism to do that filter propagation through big
elaborate chains and then as soon as somewhere down the chain someone's interested in that event
that also propagates up and the event starts flowing and we get interesting application

object in the inside and so the schema registry provides a mechanism to describe the schema of what's inside the
